color_token_compliance.primary_brand: Should use var(--color-primary) instead of hardcoded sage green
color_token_compliance.accent_color: Should use var(--color-accent) instead of hardcoded gold
color_token_compliance.background: Should use var(--color-background) instead of hardcoded off-white

typography_token_compliance.body_text: Should use var(--font-family-primary) for body text
typography_token_compliance.sizes: Should use var(--text-*) tokens instead of hardcoded sizes

spacing_token_compliance.margins: Should use var(--space-*) tokens for consistent margins
spacing_token_compliance.padding: Should use var(--space-*) tokens for consistent padding
spacing_token_compliance.gaps: Should use var(--space-*) tokens for grid and flex gaps

Text Size: Using semantic token var(--text-base)

semantic_components: Service Cards - using var(--radius-md) and var(--shadow-sm)

Color Usage - using var(--color-*) tokens exclusively
Spacing Patterns - using var(--space-*) tokens consistently

token_consistency_checks.border_tokens: All borders should use var(--radius-*) and var(--border-*) tokens
